授業目的: This Research Seminar is designed to help the students in developing their knowledge and skills in business research with particular focus on corporate sustainability management. Students will understand the complete outline of research process and will be able to conduct an independent research project on topics of their interest.
到達目標:
Upon successful completion of this seminar, students will be able to:
a) Understand the fundamental concepts of corporate sustainability management.
b) Comprehend the corporate sustainability model and its implementation.
c) Learn the complete research process.
d) Develop knowledge and skills to conduct an independent research.
e) Improve their academic writing, presentation, and communication skills.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This seminar will be conducted face-to-face in the classroom. The format of this course is based on a mixture of lectures, readings, discussions, and student presentations. Students need to read the assigned study materials to participate actively in the class discussions.
Lectures: Instructor will clarify the key concepts related with discussion.
Discussion: In consultation with the students, a particular topic will be assigned by the instructor for each session.
The discussion materials will be provided accordingly.
Presentations: Students need to make presentations on their learning including a final presentation on their research proposal.
